title: I got 2 S ranks as Zed but not able to craft mastery 6
body: I currently have 1 token from getting at least S- with Zed and then I played all random urf today and got S- but I did not get another token.  Please help.

replies.body:
ARURF is not eligible for champion mastery tokens, as *Zombiemaster* mentioned. As mentioned in our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide), you'll want to play Summoner's Rift in normal or ranked matches in order to gain tokens. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Tokens can only be earned when playing normal or ranked Summoner's Rift. You are unable to earn them when playing ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes.
